overview: A man consumed by hunger, fuelled entirely by a packet of Nik Naks and Ribena. Approaches the divine gates of heaven, a.k.a. Tesco Metro, in the hunt for his next carbohydrate fix.  A tale of sorrow, desperation and ham sandwiches. How far will he go, to escape the suffocating shackles of loneliness.
title: Ham Sandwich
